CodeSample.Name: CSNamedPipeCommunication-33b2485c
CodeSample.Title: Named-pipe communication for IPC (CSNamedPipeCommunication)
CodeSample.Summary: Named pipe is a mechanism for one-way or duplex inter-process communication between the pipe server and one or more pipe clients in the local machine or across the computers in the intranet
